CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Luxury Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Athleisure}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Fast Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Luxury Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Athleisure to Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to Fast Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Fast Fashion to Athleisure in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Athleisure in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Athleisure is {232}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Fast Fashion and Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Fast Fashion and Luxury Fashion is {446}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Luxury Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow output from Luxury Fashion is {824}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow input by Athleisure is {610}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 336? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {518} from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}, a flow of {446} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {378} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 263? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {232} from {Fast Fashion} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {159} from {Athleisure} to {Fast Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 263 and 336? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {295} from {Athleisure} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Fast Fashion to Athleisure or from Fast Fashion to Luxury Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Luxury Fashion to Athleisure, from Fast Fashion to Luxury Fashion, or from Fast Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Fast Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Fast Fashion} and {Luxury Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fast Fashion, Arc Luxury Fashion, Arc Athleisure}.
